surface_area: Total surface area of the mesh.
sa_to_bbox_volume_ratio: Ratio of surface area to bounding box volume.
mean_curvature: Mean curvature of the mesh surface.
std_curvature: Standard deviation of the mesh surface curvature.
mean_edge_length: Mean length of the edges in the mesh.
std_edge_length: Standard deviation of the edge lengths in the mesh.
mean_face_area: Mean area of the faces in the mesh.
std_face_area: Standard deviation of the face areas in the mesh.
curvature_histogram: Histogram of curvature values across the mesh surface.
